tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fashion_social_media_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand_name VARCHAR(50),
    social_media_platform VARCHAR(50),
    post_date DATE,
    likes INT,
    comments INT,
    shares INT
);

CREATE TABLE BrandSentiment (
    sentiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    sentiment_category VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES SocialMediaPosts(post_id)
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_accounts (
	account_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	platform VARCHAR(50),
	followers INT,
	engagement_rate DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE posts (
	post_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	account_id UUID,
	post_content TEXT,
	likes INT,
	comments INT,
	posted_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE sentiment_analysis (
	post_id UUID,
	sentiment_score DECIMAL,
	sentiment_category VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE social_media_data (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_text TEXT,
    post_date DATE,
    company_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES fashion_companies(company_id)
);

CREATE TABLE consumer_sentiment (
    sentiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    sentiment_category VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES social_media_data(post_id)
);

CREATE TABLE engagement_data (
    engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    likes INT,
    comments INT,
    shares INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES social_media_data(post_id)
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_accounts (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_name VARCHAR(255),
  followers_count INT,
  engagement_score DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE posts (
  post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT,
  post_text TEXT,
  likes_count INT,
  comments_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE comments (
  comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  post_id INT,
  commenter_name VARCHAR(255),
  comment_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE hashtags (
  hashtag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  hashtag_text VARCHAR(50),
  post_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE sentiments (
  sentiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  post_id INT,
  sentiment_score DECIMAL
)
